terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: By using the Sona app, you agree to the following terms.

service.title: 1. Service Description
service.content: Sona is a mobile application that helps users manage their relationships and receive AI-powered coaching. The app provides advice on personal development and relationship management.

responsibilities.title: 2. User Responsibilities
responsibilities.content:
• You agree to use the app in compliance with laws.
• You are responsible for the accuracy of the information you enter.
• You commit not to misuse the app.
• You declare that you are over 18 years old.

scope.title: 3. Service Scope
scope.content: Sona is a coaching app and does not provide professional therapy or psychological counseling services. For serious psychological issues, please seek professional help.

intellectual.title: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content, design, and software of the app are protected by copyright. Unauthorized use is prohibited.

disclaimer.title: 5. Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: Sona is not responsible for the results of the advice given. The app is provided "as is" and no warranty is given.

deletion.title: 6. Account Deletion
deletion.content: You can delete your account and all your data at any time. This action is irreversible.

changes.title: 7. Changes
changes.content: This agreement may be updated from time to time. Significant changes will be notified to you.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how your data is collected, used, and protected.

collected.title: 1. Information Collected
collected.personalList:
• Name
• Age group
• Gender
• Relationship status
• Coaching goals
collected.relationshipList:
• Partner information
• Relationship duration
• Main challenges
• Chat history

usage.title: 2. Use of Information
usage.content:
Your data is used only for the following purposes:
• To provide you with personalized coaching advice
• To improve your app experience
• To perform statistical analysis
• To improve service quality

security.title: 3. Data Security
security.encryptionText: All your data is stored encrypted on your device.
security.localText: Your data is kept only on your device and is not sent to our servers.
security.thirdPartyText: Your data is never shared with third parties.

ai.title: 4. Artificial Intelligence Use
ai.content:
Sona uses Google Gemini AI to provide you with advice. Your chat history is sent to AI, but:
• Your identity information is not shared
• Data is not used for training
• It is deleted at the end of the session

cookies.title: 5. Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: The app uses local storage for basic functionality. Third-party tracking tools are not used.

rights.title: 6. Your Rights
rights.content:
• Right to access your data
• Right to correct data
• Right to delete data
• Right to data portability

children.title: 7. Children's Privacy
children.content: Our app is not intended for users under 18. We do not knowingly collect data from users under 18.

policyChanges.title: 8. Changes
policyChanges.content: This policy may be updated. Significant changes will be announced within the app.
